metadata.name: x84
metadata.description: x84 Protocol — Agent identity, reputation, delegation, and x402 payment settlement on Solana

accounts.name: new_owner
docs: The new owner — must currently hold the Metaplex Core Asset.

accounts.name: asset
docs: The Metaplex Core Asset (the agent NFT).
Must match `agent_identity.nft_mint` and be owned by Metaplex Core program.

accounts.name: parent_delegation
docs: Must be provided when delegator is not the agent owner.
v1 note: revoking a parent does NOT cascade to children.
SDK/API layer should cascade-revoke children off-chain.
owner_version invalidation (via NFT transfer) is the canonical on-chain revocation.

accounts.name: payment_receipt
docs: Optional PaymentReceipt PDA — proves the reviewer paid for the agent's service.
If provided, the receipt is verified and auto-closed (rent returned to reviewer).
One receipt = one verified review. Prevents reuse.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The deployer who becomes protocol authority.

accounts.name: collection
docs: New Metaplex Core Collection account (keypair generated client-side).

accounts.name: asset
docs: New Metaplex Core Asset account (keypair generated client-side).

accounts.name: collection
docs: The Metaplex Core Collection this agent NFT belongs to.

accounts.name: delegation
docs: Optional delegation account for delegate callers

accounts.name: delegation
docs: Optional delegation account. Required when caller != owner.

accounts.name: delegation
docs: Optional delegation account for delegate callers

accounts.name: payer
docs: For Atomic mode: the payer signs. For Delegated/Attestation: does not need to sign.

accounts.name: payment_receipt
docs: PaymentReceipt PDA — created on settlement to prove payment happened.
Can later be consumed by give_feedback (auto-closed) or close_receipt (manual).

accounts.name: facilitator
docs: Optional facilitator signer — required for Delegated mode.
This account must have SPL delegate authority on payer_token_account.

accounts.name: delegation
docs: Optional delegation account — required for Delegated mode.

accounts.name: vault
docs: Optional vault token account for vault delegation mode.
Seeds derived from delegation key — only valid when delegation is also provided.

accounts.name: recipient_token_account
docs: Recipient token account — must be owned by the caller

errors.name: MetadataUriTooLong
errors.msg: Metadata URI exceeds maximum length of 200 characters

errors.name: VersionTooLong
errors.msg: Version string exceeds maximum length of 20 characters

errors.name: DescriptionTooLong
errors.msg: Description exceeds maximum length of 200 characters

errors.name: ResourceTooLong
errors.msg: Resource path exceeds maximum length of 200 characters

errors.name: EndpointTooLong
errors.msg: Endpoint URL exceeds maximum length of 200 characters

errors.name: InvalidFeedbackScore
errors.msg: Feedback score must be between 0 and 100

errors.name: InvalidValidationScore
errors.msg: Validation score must be between 0 and 100

errors.name: TooManyTags
errors.msg: Too many tags (maximum 5)

errors.name: TooManyAllowedTokens
errors.msg: Too many allowed tokens (maximum 5)

errors.name: TooManyAllowedPrograms
errors.msg: Too many allowed programs (maximum 5)

errors.name: AgentInactive
errors.msg: Agent is not active

errors.name: AgentAlreadyActive
errors.msg: Agent is already active

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized: caller is not the owner and has no valid delegation

errors.name: InvalidFeedbackAuth
errors.msg: Invalid feedback authorization signature

errors.name: FeedbackAlreadyRevoked
errors.msg: Feedback already revoked

errors.name: DelegationInactive
errors.msg: Delegation is not active

errors.name: DelegationExpired
errors.msg: Delegation has expired

errors.name: DelegationExhausted
errors.msg: Delegation has no remaining uses

errors.name: InsufficientPermission
errors.msg: Delegation does not have the required permission

errors.name: ExceedsPerTxLimit
errors.msg: Transaction amount exceeds delegation per-transaction limit

errors.name: ExceedsTotalLimit
errors.msg: Cumulative spend would exceed delegation total limit

errors.name: TokenNotAllowed
errors.msg: Token not allowed by delegation constraints

errors.name: ProgramNotAllowed
errors.msg: Program not allowed by delegation constraints

errors.name: SubDelegationExceedsParent
errors.msg: Sub-delegation constraints must be within parent constraints

errors.name: CannotRedelegate
errors.msg: Delegator cannot redelegate (can_redelegate is false)

errors.name: MaxDelegationDepthExceeded
errors.msg: Maximum delegation depth exceeded (max 3 levels)

errors.name: DelegationOwnerVersionMismatch
errors.msg: Delegation owner_version does not match agent (NFT was transferred)

errors.name: PaymentRequirementInactive
errors.msg: Payment requirement is not active

errors.name: InsufficientPayment
errors.msg: Payment amount is insufficient

errors.name: PaymentReplay
errors.msg: Payment ID already used (replay detected)

errors.name: ServiceAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Service type already registered for this agent

errors.name: NotNftHolder
errors.msg: Caller does not hold the agent NFT

errors.name: ValidationAlreadyResponded
errors.msg: Validation request already responded

errors.name: ValidatorMismatch
errors.msg: Validator does not match the validation request

errors.name: ModulePaused
errors.msg: Protocol module is paused

errors.name: SettlementFeeTooHigh
errors.msg: Settlement fee basis points exceeds maximum (1000 = 10%)

errors.name: InsufficientRegistrationFee
errors.msg: Insufficient SOL for registration fee

errors.name: DelegationRequiredForDelegatedMode
errors.msg: Delegated settlement requires a delegation account

errors.name: FacilitatorRequired
errors.msg: Delegated settlement requires facilitator as signer with SPL delegate authority

errors.name: FacilitatorNotApproved
errors.msg: Facilitator is not an approved SPL Token delegate on the payer's token account

errors.name: InsufficientDelegateAllowance
errors.msg: SPL Token delegate allowance insufficient for this transfer

errors.name: Ed25519InstructionNotFound
errors.msg: Ed25519 program instruction not found in transaction

errors.name: InvalidEd25519InstructionData
errors.msg: Invalid Ed25519 instruction data

errors.name: TokenMintMismatch
errors.msg: Token mint does not match payment requirement or token accounts

errors.name: PaymentAmountMismatch
errors.msg: Payment amount does not match exact requirement

errors.name: MathOverflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow

errors.name: AttestationUnauthorized
errors.msg: Attestation mode requires protocol authority or facilitator

errors.name: SelfDelegationAdminDenied
errors.msg: Self-service delegations cannot grant admin permissions

errors.name: SelfDelegationRequiresBudget
errors.msg: Self-service delegations must have a spend limit (max_spend_total > 0)

errors.name: PayToRedirectNotAllowed
errors.msg: Delegates cannot redirect payment destination away from agent owner

errors.name: ReceiptNotSettled
errors.msg: Payment receipt has not been settled

errors.name: ReceiptAgentMismatch
errors.msg: Payment receipt agent does not match feedback target

errors.name: ReceiptPayerMismatch
errors.msg: Payment receipt payer does not match reviewer

errors.name: VaultInsufficientFunds
errors.msg: Vault does not have sufficient funds for this payment

errors.name: VaultNotFunded
errors.msg: Delegation vault has not been funded

fields.name: nft_mint
docs: Metaplex Core Asset address — THIS IS THE AGENT ID

fields.name: owner
docs: Authority that controls this agent (current NFT holder)

fields.name: owner_version
docs: Incremented on claim_agent, invalidates all delegations

fields.name: feedback_authority
docs: Separate keypair for signing feedback authorizations

fields.name: metadata_uri
docs: URI to registration file (max 200 chars) — A2A Agent Card format

fields.name: metadata_hash
docs: SHA-256 of the registration file content

fields.name: verified_score_sum
docs: Sum of scores from verified feedback (0-100 each)

fields.name: unverified_score_sum
docs: Sum of scores from unverified feedback (0-100 each)

fields.name: delegation_count
docs: Counter for delegation IDs (auto-increment per agent)

fields.name: owner_version
docs: Stored at creation, verified at redemption

fields.name: can_transact
docs: Spend tokens on behalf of agent

fields.name: max_spend_per_tx
docs: Max tokens per transaction (0 = no limit)

fields.name: parent_delegation
docs: If this is a sub-delegation, points to parent Delegation PDA

fields.name: depth
docs: Delegation depth (0 = direct from owner, 1 = sub, 2 = sub-sub) — MAX 2

fields.name: nft_mint
docs: Agent receiving feedback (NFT mint / asset address)

fields.name: auth_verified
docs: Ed25519 feedback auth was verified at submission

fields.name: payment_token
docs: Token used for payment (Pubkey::default if no proof)

fields.name: tx_signature
docs: Solana tx signature of the SPL transfer

fields.name: resource
docs: Which resource was paid for (max 200 chars)

fields.name: delegation
docs: If Delegated mode: the Delegation PDA used

fields.name: collection
docs: Metaplex Core Collection address (all agent NFTs belong to this collection)

fields.name: registration_fee
docs: Fee in lamports charged on register_agent (starts at 0.05 SOL, adjustable via governance)

fields.name: settlement_fee_bps
docs: Basis points taken from each settlement (e.g., 300 = 3%). Max 1000 (10%).

fields.name: fee_treasury
docs: Treasury wallet — receives registration fees + settlement fees

fields.name: facilitator
docs: Trusted facilitator pubkey — authorized for attestation-mode settlements
